desc: Organic Bath and Beauty products hand made using Seaweed harvested from the western shores of Ireland and flowers and herbs grown on our farm. Beautiful home spa experiences to benefit all of you. Lavender, Chamomile, Calendula, Peppermint, cornflower. wild rose, thyme, rosemary, sage, comfrey,

layout.text: (Íon: Irish gaelic for pure) Organic Bath and Beauty Skincare from the Western Shores of Ireland.
